awarespage.title: Aware Social Network
awarespage.description: The full-stack AWARE application offers features such as infinite loading, authentication, DMs, user tagging, tracking trending hashtags, bookmarking, and more.
awarespage.whyWasItCreatedDesc: It was built to experiment with advanced social media features (real-time updates, tagging, trending hashtags) using modern technologies like Next.js 13 and server components.
awarespage.technologiesUsedTitle: Which technologies does the app use?
awarespage.technologiesUsedDesc: Aware is built with Next.js 13, TypeScript, React Query, and Tailwind CSS. Data is stored in a SQL or NoSQL database, and authentication can be handled by NextAuth or a custom solution.
awarespage.updateDesc: The application is constantly updated with new features and bug fixes.

features.nextjs: Next.js 13 with App Router and Server Components
features.serverComponents: Server Components for better performance and SEO
features.optimisticUpdates: Optimistic updates for smoother user experience
features.formValidation: Form validation (e.g., via React Hook Form)

artstore.title: ArtStore
artstore.description: The e-shop is designed for selling art, clothing, AI art and more. Authentication, processing payments and storing data is done on the WixClient.

neuralnetwork.title: NeuralNetwork
neuralnetwork.description: This project is a tool for visualizing and testing neural networks. I created it using Vite, React, and a new model from OpenAI - GPT-o1.

nebulatrails.title: Nebula Trails
nebulatrails.description: The project started as a simple landing page. I gradually learned how to convert files from .js, .html, .css to .jsx and .tsx. Finally, I added Stripe payments integration.

sonicrun.title: Sonic Run
sonicrun.description: Sonic Run is a simple 1-button game made in JS using the Kaplay library. The goal is to reach the highest score. The game speeds up and the difficulty increases.

posts.headerdesc: On my blog I share my experiences and thoughts related to programming.
